full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS PADMA DBANG CHEN KHAMS GSUM ZIL GNON GYI BSNYEN YIG SBAS DON KUN GSAL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @016A *, ,(CES PADMA DBANG CHEN KHAMS GSUM ZIL GNON GYI BSNYEN YIG SPAS DON KUN GSAL 'DI NI, RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I PHAN BDE LEGS BSHAD GLING GI CHOG GRA PA RNAMS DANG, CHED DU BSNYEN BSGRUB BYED MI RNAMS KYI DON DU 'DRI 'DUN YOD PA'I THOG ,GNUBS BAN PADMA DBANG GRAGS DANG, RTZIS DANG PA NGAG DBANG BDE CHEN GNYIS CHU KHYI HOR GYI ZLA BA DANG POR BSNYEN PA BYED PAR GTUGS PAS DE 'PHRAL DU, ^ ZA HOR GYI BANDES SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI 'CHAM DPON DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG DKON MCHOG GIS BRIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL,, ,,)
